name: myproject
description: **The complete cryptocurrency payment platform with built-in healthcare management.**

scripts.setup:demo: npm install && npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.demo: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c green,blue "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.test: echo "Run backend tests via: cd backend && node test-api.js (server must be running)" && exit 0
